alert.note: Alert for Brazoria; Fort Bend; Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued May 14 at 11:24AM CDT until May 14 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR NORTH CENTRAL BRAZORIA, NORTHEASTERN FORT BEND AND HARRIS COUNTIES... At 1124 AM CDT, local law enforcement reported flash flooding across the warned area. While rainfall has diminished, additional showers are expected to move through this region. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Pearland, Sugar Land, Missouri City, Alvin, Stafford, Bellaire, West University Place, Tomball, Jersey Village, Manvel, Hunters Creek Village, Bunker Hill Village, Piney Point Village, Spring Valley, Spring Branch West, Spring Branch North, Afton Oaks / River Oaks Area, Greenway / Upper Kirby Area, Memorial Park and Neartown / Montrose. This includes the following Low Water Crossings... Evergreen Road at Mustang Bayou, Trammel Fresno Road at Mustang Bayou, Rouen Road ar Clear Creek, Zion Road at Boggs Gully, Hardy Toll Road and Rankin Road, Deer Trail Drive at Halls Bayou, Gulf Bank Road at tributary of Halls Bayou, Granville Drive at Little White Oak Bayou, White Oak Drive at Little White Oak Bayou, Fuqua Gardens View Road at Sims Bayou, Farm to Market 2978 at Willow Creek, Gosling Road at Willow Creek, Cook Road at Brays Bayou Tributary, Valka Road at Theiss Gully, Schroeder Lane at Willow Creek, Walden Way at Willow Creek, Texas Spur 5 between Wheeler St and University Dr, Texas Spur 5 at Elgin Street, 4976 Westpark, Beltway 8 at Hardy Toll Road, Beltway 8 at Harwin, Beltway 8 at US 90A, Interstate 10 at Beltway 8 West, Interstate 10 eastbound Frontage under W Loop 610, Interstate 10 West of Washington, Interstate 45 at 1960, Interstate 45 at Beltway 8 North, Interstate 45 at Calhoun, Interstate 45 at Greens, Interstate 45 at Lombardy and Tellespen, Interstate 610 North at US 59, State Highway 288 at Bowling Green Pump Station, State Highway 288 at Interstate 610 South, State Highway 288 at North MacGregor, Railroad underpass on N Shepherd Drive, US 290 at Farm to Market 529, US 290 at Senate Avenue, US 59 at Hazard Street, US 59 at Kelly Street, US 59 at Mandell Street, US 59 at SP 527, US 59 at William Trace Blvd, US 59 South at US 90A, Old Spanish Trail at Griggs Road, Lone Oak Road at tributary of Halls Bayou, Sunnywood Drive at Halls Bayou, Nail Street at Mustang Bayou, Dillard Street just west of N Shepherd Dr, Wrightwood Street at Little White Oak Bayou, Tiffany Drive at Simms Bayou, Azalea Way and Shimmering Pines Road. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
